snippet.title: Up'n Down (Arcade) - Gameplay (Levels 1 to 20)
snippet.description:
Up'n Down is a videogame released by Sega in 1983. In this video I play the first 20 levels. I play with the hardest difficulty setting, but you can't see that because the Dip-Switches settings are integrated in the emulator UI (though you can guess that by looking at the amount of enemies). If you wonder why I start taking weird paths (including seemingly useless jumps) at a certain point, it's because the white flags revert to coloured flags if you drive through them  after a few levels.

I play only 20 levels because I'm not even sure if there's an ending at all; this is probably a game with infinite levels, as it was popular at that time.

Enjoy :)
